name: Suspicious Execution of Powershell with Base64
description: Commandline to launch powershell with a base64 payload
query: ((process.executable:(/.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND process.command_line:(/.*\ \-[Ee]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Nn]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Nn][Cc]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo].*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Cc]\ .*/)) AND (NOT (process.command_line:/.*\ \-[Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo][Dd][Ii][Nn][Gg]\ .*/)))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) AND process.command_line:(*\ \-e\ * OR *\ \-en\ * OR *\ \-enc\ * OR *\ \-enco* OR *\ \-ec\ *)) AND (NOT (process.command_line:*\ \-Encoding\ *)))`
